Title: Enhances penalties for aggravated cruelty to animals; allows aggravated animal abuse to be considered for bail
Summary: Enhances penalties for aggravated cruelty to animals by making such offense a felony, including torture, beating, or killing of any animal; makes animal cruelty, including overdriving or depriving an animal of sustenance a felony when committed while released on recognizance for violating an order of protection; allows aggravated animal abuse to be considered for bail.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in regard to enhancing penalties for aggravated animal abuse; and to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to allowing aggravated animal abuse to be considered for bail
